summary: This is an email from attorney Chris R. Rodgers sharing a folder containing documents (depositions, medical records, expert reports) from a civil matter against Jeffrey Epstein. The email is sent to attorneys Jack Scarola and Mary McCan, and includes a confidentiality notice from the law firm Searcy Denney Scarola Barnhart & Shipley, P.A.

keyFacts: Attorney Chris R. Rodgers shared a folder containing documents from a civil matter against Jeffrey Epstein, including depositions, medical records, and expert reports.
The documents were shared with attorneys Jack Scarola and Mary McCan via email on January 19-20, 2021.
The communication originates from the law firm Searcy Denney Scarola Barnhart & Shipley, P.A. and is marked as privileged and confidential.
The file reference EFTA00086352 appears in the document, along with the name Wend P. Calvet in the reference string.
The email includes a standard legal confidentiality notice warning about the privileged nature of the communication.
